content.rendered:
Directed by Imtiaz Ali

Written by Wajid Shaikh

Cast Kartik Aaryan (Veer and Raghu). Sara Ali Khan (Zoe). Randeep Hooda (Raghvendra Raj). Sonu Saini (Chef). Arushi Sharma (Leena). Siddharth Shaw (Rathore). Guneet Singh Sodhi (Boyfriend (Stud Boy )). Amrit Arora (Justice Chaudhary). Raaf Chaudhary (Cafe owner). Cricknowle (Shreyansh). Eesh (Boyfriend). Kavita Ghai (Veer’s mother).Radhika Kashyap. Vipin Katyal (Jaat Haryanvi). Richard Bhakti Klein (Sander Jennings (as R. Bhakti Klein)). Umair Patel (Musical Artist (archive sound)).Pranati Rai Prakash. Naina Sareen (Barnali).Sujeet Kumar Sharma. Brian Nathan Siegal (Businessman (as Brian Nathan)). Skaterrboyy20 (Suny). SwettaPadda (Sajan Kanwar (as Shweta Padda)). Preeti Verma

Languages Hindi

Producers Imtiaz Ali. Deepak Bhagra. Kushagra Kulshrestha. Rajesh Sharma. Manish Soni. Sanjay Soni. Siddharth Soni. Manu Sud. Dinesh Vijan

Production The Crew Rajastha
